Through December 2020, the Bank is gradually phasing out the dissemination of credit aggregates and securities statistics. This table will be discontinued after the release of September 2020 data.
As of November 2015, business credit has been restructured to reflect business loans, debt securities and equity. Please refer to table 176-0023 for business credit.
